description.para: The standard XProc step name attribute.
Anonymous input port that receives the pipeline to run. This is not the step’s primary port!
Its attributes and child elements are like any other XProc p:with-input element, except that, since the port is anonymous, it does not have a port attribute.
Element for passing inputs to the pipeline being run.
Element for passing options to the pipeline being run.
Element that declares an output port of the pipeline being run.
Its attributes and child elements are like any other XProc p:output element. Port names used must be the same as for the output ports of the step being run.
